mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.activity_id AS "activityId", a.title AS "title", a.images AS "images", a.flow_start_time AS "flowStartTime", a.flow_end_time AS "flowEndTime", a.order_num AS "orderNum", a.address AS "address", a.descs AS "descs", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN cms_activity b ON b.id = a.activity_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM cms_activity_flow a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.activity_id LIKE '%'||#{activityId}||'%' '%'+#{activityId}+'%' concat('%',#{activityId},'%')
AND a.title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' '%'+#{title}+'%' concat('%',#{title},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.create_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_activity_flow( id, activity_id, title, images, flow_start_time, flow_end_time, order_num, address, descs, create_by, create_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{activityId}, #{title}, #{images}, #{flowStartTime}, #{flowEndTime}, #{orderNum}, #{address}, #{descs}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_activity_flow SET activity_id = #{activityId}, title = #{title}, images = #{images}, flow_start_time = #{flowStartTime}, flow_end_time = #{flowEndTime}, order_num = #{orderNum}, address = #{address}, descs = #{descs}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
